general_disclaimer.message: This extension is not affiliated with or endored by aniSearch. It's a third-party tool.

settings_linkMau2_description.message: Adds a link to the japanese voice cast page on Mau2

settings_linkMau2Translate_description.message: Adds a link to the japanese voice cast page on Mau2, translated through Google Translate (functions better as you'd expect, at least for the VA names, less for the characters)

settings_inputButtonColors_description.message: Ever clicked the wrong button? Now, all 'Replace' buttons are orange, and all 'Remove' buttons are red.

settings_mau2Translator_description.message: Adds buttons on mau2.com to translate the entries into Romaji and Englis

modules_linkMau2_button_tooltip.message: Searches for this anime on Mau2

modules_linkMau2Translate_button_tooltip.message: Searches for this anime on Mau2 through Google Translate

modules_mau2Translator_error_queueStoppe.message: The queue in question has been stopped. Please try refreshing the page and re-queueing translations. If the issue persists, you were ratelimited by the service used. In that case, wait 10-30 minutes and try again.
